adjectives.description: cyclonic (comparative more cyclonic, superlative most cyclonic)

entries.meaning: Of, pertaining to, or resembling a cyclone.
examples: The wind was blowing in cyclonic fashion, but not a drop of rain fell.

entries.meaning: (meteorology) Rotating in the same direction as the Earth i.e. anticlockwise in the Northern Hemisphere and clockwise in the Southern Hemisphere.
